definition: A person or entity responsible for causing an incident resulting in harm, damage, or an accident. This term is commonly used in legal and insurance contexts to refer to the party at fault or the one who caused the accident.

examples.english: The person responsible for the accident fled the scene.

examples.german: Die Polizei konnte den Unfallverursacher identifizieren.
examples.english: The police were able to identify the person responsible for the accident.

examples.german: Der Unfallverursacher wurde zu einer Geldstrafe verurteilt.
examples.english: The person responsible for the accident was sentenced to a fine.

examples.german: Der Unfallverursacher gab an, die Ampel übersehen zu haben.
examples.english: The person responsible for the accident claimed to have overlooked the traffic light.
The person responsible for the accident was under the influence of alcohol.
